products.title: Crushed Velvet Pearl Curtain
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Elegant pearl curtains, a median between their white and ivory, uses a light touch of cream to create a soft off-white tone. Product id: db-cur1001 fabric colour: pearl material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes crushed velvet pearl curtain in white.

products.title: Crushed Velvet Ivory Curtain
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Ivory curtains allow a light an airy feel whilst using a light splash of cream to retain an element of warmth. Product id: db-cur0996 fabric colour: ivory material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes crushed velvet ivory curtain in cream.
